name: expandjs
description: This is a set of functions, designed to enhance your JavaScript programming experience.
author: ExpandJS <dev@expandjs.com> (http://expandjs.com)

scripts.build: node bin/build && browserify bin --standalone XP > dist/expandjs.js && npm run build:min
scripts.build:min: browserify -d bin --standalone XP -p [minifyify --map expandjs.min.map --output dist/expandjs.min.map] > dist/expandjs.min.js
